name: Short Text Classification Apply Processor
description: Applies a short text model to text.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be applied. If a model with this name cannot be found, the data will go through unchanged.

parameters.name: destroy_on_eof
parameters.description: Will this model be cleaned up once EOF is reached.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The field the data resides in. Data must be of type Seq[Double].

parameters.name: features_to_add
parameters.description: If given, the fields in this list specify additional feature vectors to add.
A field containing an additional feature vector.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of all the data inside the DP. Used for finding sentence boundaries.
